detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

      }
    </script>

</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    </script>

</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.script:
import { html } from "@htmlplus/element/runtime";

@Element("plus-spinner-type")
class SpinnerType {
  static members = {};

  render() {
    return html`<plus-grid justify-content="evenly">
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="default"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="double-bounce"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="ring"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="ripple"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="dual-ring"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <plus-spinner type="square"></plus-spinner>
  </plus-grid-item>
</plus-grid>`;
  }

}

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

detail.react:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'react';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
detail.vue:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>

</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { html } from "@htmlplus/element/runtime";

@Element("plus-tooltip-arrows")
class TooltipArrows {
  static members = {};

  render() {
    return html`<fragment>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Default
    <plus-tooltip>Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Round
    <plus-tooltip arrow="round">Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Large
    <plus-tooltip placement="bottom" arrow="large">Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Small
    <plus-tooltip placement="top" arrow="small">Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Wide
    <plus-tooltip placement="top" arrow="wide">Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
  <button class="btn" xs="12" sm="4">
    Narrow
    <plus-tooltip placement="top" arrow="narrow">Tooltip</plus-tooltip>
  </button>
</fragment>`;
  }

}

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { html } from "@htmlplus/element/runtime";

@Element("plus-tooltip-placement")
class TooltipPlacement {
  static members = {};

  render() {
    return html`<plus-grid gutter="md">
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Top
      <plus-tooltip placement="top">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Top Start
      <plus-tooltip placement="top-start">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Top End
      <plus-tooltip placement="top-end">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Right
      <plus-tooltip placement="right">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Right Start
      <plus-tooltip placement="right-start">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Right End
      <plus-tooltip placement="right-end">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Bottom
      <plus-tooltip placement="bottom">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Bottom Start
      <plus-tooltip placement="bottom-start">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Bottom End
      <plus-tooltip placement="bottom-end">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Left
      <plus-tooltip placement="left">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Left Start
      <plus-tooltip placement="left-start">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="4">
    <button>
      Left End
      <plus-tooltip placement="left-end">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
</plus-grid>`;
  }

}

</plus-grid>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { html } from "@htmlplus/element/runtime";

@Element("plus-tooltip-trigger")
class TooltipTrigger {
  static members = {};

  render() {
    return html`<plus-grid justify-content="evenly">
  <plus-grid-item>
    <button>
      Hover
      <plus-tooltip trigger="hover">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <button>
      Focus
      <plus-tooltip trigger="focus">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item>
    <button>
      Click
      <plus-tooltip trigger="click">
        Tooltip
      </plus-tooltip>
    </button>
  </plus-grid-item>
</plus-grid>`;
  }

}

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { html } from "@htmlplus/element/runtime";

@Element("plus-transition-duration")
class TransitionDuration {
  static members = {};

  render() {
    return html`<plus-grid justify-content="evenly" gutter="md">
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="slower">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="slow">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="normal">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="fast">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="faster">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="6" md="4" xl="auto">
    <plus-transition name="fade-in" repeat="infinite" duration="2.5s">
      HTMLPLUS
    </plus-transition>
  </plus-grid-item>
</plus-grid>`;
  }

}
